EmailTemplate.name: Wingman Online Ordering
EmailTemplate.subject: WM: Database Online Order {!Case.Account} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, To purchase or renew your database, simply go to https://wingmanservices.bendixking.com/wingman/pages/wingmanLoginPage.jsp. You can register for a User ID and password on this page.
Once you have registered, please sign in and click on the "Order / View Subscriptions" link at the top of the page. Here you will see pricing, available subscription quantity options and you may choose to receive your database by physical delivery or internet download.
If you prefer internet downloads then you will need the following hardware.
1.PC Interface Cable 2.USB to serial adapter
If you require a PC Interface Cable to upload the database, please contact your local dealer. To find a dealer, please go to our website, www.bendixking.com and select "Where to Buy".
See part numbers below:
KLN 94 Part # 050 03612 0000 KLN 89, KLN 90/900, KLX 135A Part # 050 03213 0000
To purchase a USB to serial adapter, which will allow you to connect the cable to your laptop's USB port, please visit www.tripplite.com and enter part number USA19HS and they will tell you where you can locate one.
If you need help with uploading the database you may contact Tech Support at 855- 250-7027 option 2.
Best regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Data Services
